description: Full of flavour, you will be going back for seconds.
name: Japanese Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg chicken thigh fillets, cut into small cubes
1 small piece of fresh ginger, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in large deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 5 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a plate.

Melt butter in same pan and add the onion. Cook, stirring until browned, about 4 minutes. Add ginger and garlic, cooking for about 30 seconds. Add flour. Cook, stirring for 4 minutes or until mixture is well browned.

Add curry powder, tomato paste and stir until combined. Add at least 3/4 of the chicken stock and stir until well combined. Add remaining stock and 1 1/4 cups water, bring to a simmer. Add chicken, carrot and beans. Simmer for 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Add soy sauce and honey and cook for a further 5 minutes. Serve with rice.
